translations.Mattermost integration provides a dashbo:
Mattermost integration provides a dashboard widget displaying your most important notifications
and a unified search provider for messages. It also lets you send files to Mattermost from Nextcloud Files.
translations.Failed to save Mattermost admin options: Failed to save Mattermost admin options
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: If you want to allow your Nextcloud users to use OAuth to authenticate to a Mattermost instance of your choice, create an application in your Mattermost settings and set the ID and secret here.
translations.Make sure you set the \"Redirect URI\" t: Make sure you set the "Redirect URI" to
translations.Put the \"Application ID\" and \"Applica: Put the "Application ID" and "Application secret" below. Your Nextcloud users will then see a "Connect to Mattermost" button in their personal settings if they select the Mattermost instance defined here.
translations.Client secret of your Mattermost applica: Client secret of your Mattermost application
translations.You can connect with a personal token OR: You can connect with a personal token OR just with your login/password.
translations.Add file action to send files to Matterm: Add file action to send files to Mattermost
translations.Enable navigation link (link to Mattermo: Enable navigation link (link to Mattermost with a top menu item)
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Warning, everything you type in the search bar will be sent to Mattermost.
translations.If you have configured the Nextcloud int: If you have configured the Nextcloud integration in Mattermost, it will automatically remotely configure those webhooks.
translations.This section does not require to be conn: This section does not require to be connected to Mattermost from Nextcloud.
translations.Message to send with the files: Message to send with the files
translations.Directories will be skipped, they can on: Directories will be skipped, they can only be sent as links.
